constituent: bull’s eye, white, dove, ladle, bound up, drop
heisigStory: The elements white bird and ladle easily suggest the image of a bull's eye if you imagine a rusty old ladle with a bull's eye painted on it in the form of a tiny white bird, who lets out a little "peep" every time you hit the target.
koohiiStory1: I managed to hit the bull´s eye by throwing my white ladle.
koohiiStory2: A white, bound up, drop in the center is the bull´s eye. (why Heisig had to use "ladle" instead of the original two primitives that make up "ladle" I´ll never understand!).
myStory: mắt bò. mục tiêu. muôi trắng như mắt bò.
words: a priori, inborn, innate, inherent, congenital, hereditary
